subject: Damp evening on the sound side
headline: Greenhouse is holding steady while the island stays quiet
body:
Outside sits at 47° with enough humidity to rust a bumper overnight. The greenhouse is holding 68°, so she's running fine. Keep the hatch closed to keep the damp salt air off the leaves.

Ghost season is officially here. It's just contractors and cops on the road now. Locals finally got the bar stools back at the restaurants. Enjoy the quiet while it lasts.
